code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{getOrderByUser}from"../../../../actions/OrderAction";import{formatPrice}from'../../../../untils/index';import"./AllOrder.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const orderItem=item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"all-myorder-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"all-myorder-item-img",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.image})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"all-myorder-item-name",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:item.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["x",item.qty]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"all-myorder-item-price",children:formatPrice(item.salePrice)})]});export const orderParent=item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"all-myorder-parent-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"all-myorder-list",children:item.orderItems.map(item=>orderItem(item))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"all-myorder-item-totalprice",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"T\u1ED5ng s\u1ED1 ti\u1EC1n : "})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("strong",{children:[formatPrice(item.totalPrice),"\u0111"]})]})})]});function AllOrder(props){const dispatch=useDispatch();const{myOrders}=useSelector(state=>state.orderByUser);const{userInfo}=useSelector(state=>state.userSignin);useEffect(()=>{dispatch(getOrderByUser(userInfo._id));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"all-myorder",children:myOrders&&myOrders.length>0?myOrders.map(item=>orderParent(item)):"Bạn không có đơn hàng nào"});}export default AllOrder;
